title: LA Lakers font
content: hey fowks , what's the font used by the LA lakers basketball team on their jerseys?
author: mephisto1011

comments.content:
I think it's a customized Italic Bodoni.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/atf-bodoni/bodoni-italic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141026060047/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/atf-bodoni/bodoni-italic/)
